textBox.richText: Given the way our flights worked out we were lucky enough to have a couple of days to stop over in Singapore! It has been an enjoyable stay taking advantage of a little rest and relaxation, a tad of shopping and more good food (which has essentially been the theme of the entire trip!). Singapore has been a great location to break up the long flight home and fingers crossed will help us fight jet lag and enable a semi-productive work day on Monday! Although to be fair even at full capacity no one can really say that we’re that productive! So after 18,400 kms in a plane, a tad under 1,000 kms via train and 3,500 kms behind the wheel of our trusty Peugeot our trip has concluded. Pity John Candy isn’t still around to hep us make a sequel to the 80s classic Planes, Trains & Automobiles - I know that he’d make a perfect fit for my character although not sure how Steve Martin will play Felicity.... Anyway that’s all from us - along with the thousands of kilometres travelled we’ve also taken close on 3,000 pictures so let us know if any of you would like us to tee up an enthralling slide night!
